item.title: Piquant - BYOL Sessions
item.description: Sound Recording, Mix, Live Sound (2020-present) Watch here A lunchtime concert series hosted by Piquant Media, platforming a diverse array of Irish musicians in various venues in Limerick city. Keating handles live sound, sound recording, and post-production sound mixing/mastering for the project. Through this project he has worked with Princ€ss, Mohammed Syfkhan, Baptist Goth (pictured), The Mary Wallopers, Poor Creature, Naive Ted, Maija Sofia, Hazey Haze + Citrus Fresh, I Dreamed I Dream, and His Father’s Voice.
